title: An Act relative to combating hate in the Commonwealth

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Gomez, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1126) of Adam Gomez and Attorney General Andrea Joy Campbell,  for legislation relative to combat hate in the Commonwealth.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
